content.text: Match ends, West Ham United 3, Watford 1.
Second Half ends, West Ham United 3, Watford 1.
Substitution, West Ham United. James Collins replaces Dimitri Payet.
Second yellow card to Nordin Amrabat (Watford) for a bad foul.
Foul by Nordin Amrabat (Watford).
Winston Reid (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Watford. Conceded by Adrián.
Penalty saved! Troy Deeney (Watford) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.
Penalty conceded by Angelo Ogbonna (West Ham United) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Watford. Sebastian Prödl draws a foul in the penalty area.
Corner,  Watford. Conceded by Adrián.
Attempt blocked. Manuel Lanzini (West Ham United) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Mark Noble (West Ham United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Valon Behrami (Watford).
Substitution, West Ham United. Emmanuel Emenike replaces Andy Carroll.
Nordin Amrabat (Watford) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Victor Moses (West Ham United).
Attempt missed. Manuel Lanzini (West Ham United) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Michail Antonio with a through ball.
Attempt saved. Victor Moses (West Ham United) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Andy Carroll with a through ball.
Foul by José Holebas (Watford).
Victor Moses (West Ham United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Andy Carroll (West Ham United).
Juan Carlos Paredes (Watford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Craig Cathcart (Watford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Andy Carroll (West Ham United).
Substitution, West Ham United. Victor Moses replaces Diafra Sakho.
Substitution, Watford. Troy Deeney replaces Almen Abdi.
Nordin Amrabat (Watford) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Nordin Amrabat (Watford).

Manuel Lanzini (West Ham United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Mario Suárez (Watford).
Angelo Ogbonna (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Steven Berghuis (Watford).
Attempt missed. Steven Berghuis (Watford) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by José Holebas.
Attempt saved. Andy Carroll (West Ham United) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Dimitri Payet with a cross.
Corner,  West Ham United. Conceded by Juan Carlos Paredes.
Attempt blocked. Winston Reid (West Ham United) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Andy Carroll with a headed pass.
Corner,  West Ham United. Conceded by Mario Suárez.
Corner,  West Ham United. Conceded by Mario Suárez.

Goal!  West Ham United 3, Watford 1. Sebastian Prödl (Watford) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Steven Berghuis with a cross following a set piece situation.
José Holebas (Watford) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Michail Antonio (West Ham United).
Attempt blocked. Cheikhou Kouyaté (West Ham United) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Foul by Almen Abdi (Watford).
Mark Noble (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Watford. Ikechi Anya replaces Adlène Guédioura.
Substitution, Watford. Steven Berghuis replaces Jurado.
Foul by José Holebas (Watford).
Mark Noble (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Nordin Amrabat (Watford) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Angelo Ogbonna (West Ham United).
Goal!  West Ham United 3, Watford 0. Mark Noble (West Ham United) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the centre of the goal.
Penalty conceded by Almen Abdi (Watford) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty West Ham United. Michail Antonio draws a foul in the penalty area.
Attempt missed. Almen Abdi (Watford) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Jurado with a cross.

Second Half begins West Ham United 2, Watford 0.
First Half ends, West Ham United 2, Watford 0.
Attempt missed. Manuel Lanzini (West Ham United) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Diafra Sakho.
Goal!  West Ham United 2, Watford 0. Mark Noble (West Ham United) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.

Goal!  West Ham United 1, Watford 0. Andy Carroll (West Ham United) left footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Dimitri Payet with a through ball.
